ItemFilter.name: Bina's Master Filter (Personal Use Only)
ItemFilter.description: BINA'S MASTER FILTER - You **MUST** select Affixes in EIGHT rules. These rules contain **ADD WANTED AFFIXES** in their description. Last updated - Mar 1 2024
